item.title: Your Pup’s Dinner Can Have Greater Climate Impacts Than Your Own Meals
item.description: Depending upon formulation, dog food has a more variable — and sometimes larger — environmental pawprint than human diets.

item.title: Sebastian Stan’s ‘The Batman Part 2’ Role May Confirm Scarlett Johansson’s
item.description: If we know who Sebastian Stan is playing in The Batman Part 2, that may confirm who Scarlett Johansson is playing as well.

item.title: Noah Wyle Shares Some Early, Interesting ‘The Pitt’ Season 3 Info
